works.name: Genimen
works.description: Machine learning group project that analysis smart phone reviews. This gives various feedback for smart phones and categorically analyse them. This is a MVP and can be further extended to support other products

works.name: Google batch translate
works.description: Simple script that lets you translate  batch of text in json format using  Google Translate API. This was done to help add locale support to a react app I was contributing to.

works.name: Dot Files
works.description: This contains my linux scripts, cli-tools and configuration files for neovim, tmux, fish, etc.

works.name: PKCE OAuth in React
works.description: This is a simple react project for reference purposes, that implements  PKCE OAuth flow from scratch without any SDK with an API to support token refresh logic.
